title: (x) I am trying to idnetify this font. / Round display sans w/ uncial e - Advertisers Gothic {self (Francesco B), Florian}
content:
Please help me identify this typeface for a project i am working on.  
I have come close to finding it, but i cant seem to find a consistent face that has the UpperCase A with that bar...  
I tried posting the image before but i couldnt get the image to upload.  
I am trying again.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131123500im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IdentiFont_01_5688.jpg)
author: Studio Gestalt

comments.content: Closest match so far has be Legothic and/or Advertiser's Gothic Light..but they are not really it.

HiH has [a version of Advertisers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131123500/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/advertisers-gothic/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D52%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DA%2520Eat%2520More%2520Cream%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D40) that has that ‘A’ (plus an [alternate form](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131123500/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/advertisers-gothic/regular/characters.html)).
That right there . . . put that on a t-shirt just the way it is.
It’s [HiH (Hand-in-Hand) Retrofonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131123500/http:/www.hihretro.com/) from Connecticut. There were links in my previous post.
